name: 2069 Box Inbound 0.1
description:
Thanks for taking your time to check out my game. i just rebuilt my 2nd game to a new version of unity i changed up the story and plot. its now 10 x more understanding now. minor bug fixes 

You are Ryan Former Chef in Blade Kitchen Resturaunt you were recently fired from your drink habits. your wife is jessica. and you have 3 kids you started to spend all your time drinking whisky and watching the football game. you lost interest in your kids and wife. until you have this dream making you to do stuff you dont want to. 

What will you do?
